text: Eehey mon goonɗinɓe wote njaggire añɓe Mi e añɓe mon heetɓe hoɗon mberlo e mum en gilli te koɓe yedduɓe goongo garɗo o e mon, hoɓe njaltina nelaaɗo e onon sabu tan on ngoonɗanii Alla joomi mon, tawde on njalti sabu jihaadi e laawol Am e ɗaɓjude weluya am, hoɗon cuurtanaɓe kabaruuji juulɓe ngam ɓe mbele mon, Mbeɗa anndi ko cuuɗoton e ko ɓanngiɗon, kala e mon baɗɗo ɗuum o majji laawol peewngol
